thread.title: Pair charged with trafficking heroin in Bellows Falls
thread.title_full: Pair charged with trafficking heroin in Bellows Falls - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Pair charged with trafficking heroin in Bellows Falls
text:
BELLOWS FALLS, Vt. - Charges are coming for a pair of Connecticut residents after they allegedly brought heroin into Vermont.
Police say they stopped 28-year-old Kevin Chapman of New Britain at about 10 p.m. Friday on Rockingham Street in Bellows Falls for a civil violation.
They say he ran after a search revealed a small amount of cocaine.
Authorities arrested him and his passenger, 29-year-old Veronica Rivera of Hartford. A follow-up search with a K-9 later located nearly 600 bags of heroin.
The duo face charges including trafficking cocaine, possession of crack and attempting to flee.
